fields.title: Monmouth University New Jersey Poll, Number 49

datasetContact.datasetContactAffiliation: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This survey was conducted among residents of New Jersey and addresses approval ratings of Gov. Christie, the 2012 general election, favorability of NJ politicians, and NJ Quality of Life Index.
